readable.title: 3351667632_00f586a30c
readable.content: A group of men are standing on a desert road whilst one man hands a blue box to another . A man handing a box to a group of men . A man is handing a box to another man in a group . A man wearing a backwards blue cap hands something to one man in a line of men . Older black man handing small blue object to group of younger black men , outdoors .
